  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.convert.DeprecatedSolrCustomConversions
    since 2.0, use SolrCustomConversions.
  • Deprecated Annotation Interfaces
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    org.springframework.data.solr.repository.Score
    since 4.0. Use Score instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.mapping.SolrDocument.solrCoreName()
    since 3.0. Please use SolrDocument.collection().
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.AbstractQueryDecorator.getPageRequest()
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.Query.getPageRequest()
    since 1.3. Will be removed in 1.4. Please use Query.getOffset() and Query.getRows() instead.
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.SimpleQuery.addGroupByField(String)
    in favor of GroupOptions
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.SimpleQuery.addGroupByField(Field)
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.SimpleQuery.getGroupByFields()
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.QueryParser.constructSolrQuery(SolrDataQuery)
    since 4.0. Use QueryParser.constructSolrQuery(SolrDataQuery, Class) instead.
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.QueryParser.getQueryString(SolrDataQuery)
    since 4.0. Use QueryParser.getQueryString(SolrDataQuery, Class) instead.
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.QueryParserBase.appendProjectionOnFields(SolrQuery, List<Field>)
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.QueryParserBase.createQueryStringFromCriteria(Criteria)
    since 4.0. Use QueryParserBase.createQueryStringFromCriteria(Criteria, Class) instead.
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.QueryParserBase.createQueryStringFromNode(Node)
    since 4.0. Use QueryParserBase.createQueryStringFromNode(Node, Class) instead
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.QueryParserBase.createQueryStringFromNode(Node, int)
    since 4.0. Use QueryParserBase.createQueryStringFromNode(Node, int, Class) instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.DistanceField(String, String, Point)
    since 4.1. Replace with: DistanceField.distanceAs(String) and add an explicit FilterQuery with a DistanceFunction.
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.DistanceField(String, Point)
    since 4.1. Replace with: DistanceField.distanceAs(String) and add an explicit FilterQuery with a DistanceFunction.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.query.result.Cursor.State.REDAY
    since 3.1. Please use READY instead.
  • Deprecated Annotation Interface Elements
    Annotation Interface Element
    Description
    org.springframework.data.solr.core.mapping.SolrDocument.solrCoreName()
    since 3.0. Please use SolrDocument.collection().
